title: CRM Specialist
description:
We are in the unique position to experience new and interesting situations that many companies have never seen before. We share this (extraordinary) journey with our customers and always aim to retain them by delivering solutions. If you are a person that finds joy in managing customers' expectations, trying to understand their purchasing behavior and loves to experiment with new ways of making an impact then challenge yourself by joining our dedicated CRM team.

About the role:

  • CRM Monthly Planning and execution with focus to higher engagement with our customers and higher retention rate.
  • Set up (ad hoc) promotional campaigns for marketing initiatives by leveraging all CRM channels (email, mobile and web push notifications, in app messages) and experiment with the best combination per case.
  • Address all critical user lifecycle stages through ongoing cross-channel communication and constantly optimize these messages based on findings.
  • Monitor and ensure deliverability of our communications, message responsiveness to device, tracking and redirection to web or app pages that fulfill customers’ expectations.
  • Plan, execute and document A/B tests that involve segments, messages and timing parameters.
  • Own campaign level reporting and evaluation, analyze results in a way that contributes to CRM performance through actionable insights.
